text: City of the Living Dead () is a 1980 Italian horror movie directed by Lucio Fulci. It stars Christopher George, Catriona MacColl, Carlo de Mejo, Luciano Rossi, and Lucio Fulci. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1980 horror movies Category:Italian horror movies Category:Movies directed by Lucio Fulci
title: City of the Living Dead
